video.title: Paranormal Home Inspectors
video.synopsis: A home inspector and a psychic team up to investigate unusual occurrences to determine if they can be explained rationally or are paranormal.

episodes.synopsis: A single mom notices something odd with her newly purchased home. She doesn't believe in ghosts but has no other explanation for what is happening.
episodes.title: Mysterious Events (Fogarty)

episodes.synopsis: In 1993, a young family moved into their custom-built home, but even brand new houses aren’t excluded from paranormal activity.
episodes.title: Is the Writing on the Wall? (Mattina)

episodes.synopsis: A bachelor wonders if his old-style downtown loft's history as a church has anything to do with the strange goings-on he's been experiencing.
episodes.title: Spiritual Awakening (Conroy)

episodes.synopsis: A man inherits his grandmother's house after his grandmother and mother pass away. Since their deaths, the homeowner has experienced strange events.
episodes.title: The Inheritance (Ciancio)

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates a homestead where bizarre things happen daily. It rests along a river that was part of the battleground in the War of 1812.
episodes.title: A Prairie Haunting (Caouette)

episodes.synopsis: The PHI Team investigates some unsettling experiences on a family farm. Could the family cemetery on the property have something to do with it?
episodes.title: Generations Past (Hazen/McKillen)

episodes.synopsis: A semi-retired couple move into a serene country home. The wife believes the previous owners' deaths are connected to the home's abnormal activity.
episodes.title: Reclaiming the Home (Curtis Gosse)

episodes.synopsis: A mother grieves for her 22-year-old daughter. While she copes with her mysterious death, strange activity occurs in her house.
episodes.title: Family Ties (Jalbert/Timony)

episodes.synopsis: A small town has been the site of two mining disasters and a train wreck. A nearby house has been experiencing paranormal events. Is there a link?
episodes.title: Mining Town Ghosts? (Gunson)

episodes.synopsis: An expectant mom believes a strange entity has followed her through life. But since moving to her new home, the spirits she senses are more sinister.
episodes.title: New House, New Spirits (Dorman/Hodgins)

episodes.synopsis: What was supposed to be a cozy home for a family of four has turned into a terrifying experience -- and it is mostly directed at the teenage daughter.
episodes.title: A Family Affair (Lacey/Raynard)

episodes.synopsis: A single woman has recently moved back into her century-old home after evicting her tenants, but she has experienced very bizarre phenomena.
episodes.title: The Rented House (Geer)

episodes.synopsis: A blended family begins experiencing the inexplicable in their new home, from hearing steps and slamming doors to lights turning themselves on.
episodes.title: Rowdy House (Campbell)
